long_description: Provide a long and detailed description of the image.
location: Is the photograph taken 'indoor' or 'outdoor'? If not a photograph, return 'N/A'. Answer with one word only.
objects: List the name of the objects in this image. Returns only a comma separated list.
text: Extract all the text from the image into a JSON object. For a form, ensure the key is a question or label and the value is a response.
